item.title: Summary of Common Sense guide to Data Structures and Algorithms
item.description: Hello! I’ve been working on something extensive these days. Like my Grokking Algorithms summary, I now moved on to read Common-Sense Guide to Data Structures and Algorithms. As with Grokking, I created a Go based repo and added notes for each chapter. The repo can be located here. Enjoy, and thanks for reading. Gergely.
